channel.title: How do I add where I pull the lever and it teleports me somewhere?
channel.description: Im trying to add a lever or something when they use it, it thus teleports them to a location, what do I do to make this?

item.title: How do I add where I pull the lever and it teleports me somewhere?
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

In client.java find:

case 1568: case 1569: case 1570: case 1571: case 1759: case 1762: case 1763: case 1764: case 2113: case 3771: case 54: case 56: case 5947: case 6434: case 1754: case 492: case 2147: case 5054: case 5130: case 9358: case 5488:

Then under that put:

case 5959: if(!teleblock) { teleportToX = CoordX; teleportToY = CoordY; } else if(teleblock) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } }

Thanks,

~Armo

Read full topic
